name: Mega Man X Alpha
summary: Mega Man X Alpha is a hard-type modification for Mega Man X by "myselfthethird" adding new challenges and difficulty-focused elements to the original Mega Man X game. It greatly expands the scope of the game with the addition of new modding tools that allow more radical redesign of the levels.
